entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022
